title: Firefox iOS passwords are coming up blank.
content: I used Firefox for iOS all the time on my previous iPhone. When I got a new one and downloaded it, I came across this issue. I am logged in to Firefox and all the sites I have passwords for are saved. It also asks me if I wish to save passwords. Neither of these function properly. All the passwords and usernames come up blank.
creator: eric.shingletonsmith

title: Weird language on specific website
content:
I see a weird language on specific browser, image attached.

Tried re-installing browser, cleared cookies and cache on browser and restarted. Issue doesn't fix

Language is set as English

Me colleagues doesn't have an issue. Safari works fine though.

Issue is with firefox and chrome browsers

Please help!

title: How to allow extensions from outside the UI in Private Browsing
content:
Is there a way to allow extensions from outside the UI for Private Browsing? I manage multiple devices and it is difficult to configure everything from within the UI.
